headline: CenterPoint Energy, Inc. Announces Offering of $550 Million of Convertible Senior Notes Due 2029
summary: HOUSTON, February 23, 2026--CenterPoint Energy, Inc. (NYSE: CNP) or "CenterPoint" today announced that it intends to offer, subject to market and other conditions, $550 million aggregate principal amount of its Convertible Senior Notes due 2029 (the "convertible notes") in a private placement to persons reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act").
